prompt:
Given the following skeleton of a DOM tree, fix any performance issues present, return the modified element within the skeleton as well as the original position selector:

            _____ 
            <!DOCTYPE html>
            <html> 
                <head>
                    <!-- Original position of the element to be modified: html > head > meta:nth-child(1) --> 
                    <meta charset="utf-8"/>
                    <!-- End of element to be modified --> 
                </head>
            </html> 
            _____

Given the following skeleton of a DOM tree, fix any performance issues present, return the modified element within the skeleton as well as the original position selector:

            _____ 
            <!DOCTYPE html>
            <html> 
                <head>
                    <!-- Original position of the element to be modified: html > head > meta:nth-child(2) --> 
                    <meta content="ie=edge" http-equiv="x-ua-compatible"/>
                    <!-- End of element to be modified --> 
                </head>
            </html> 
            _____

Given the following skeleton of a DOM tree, fix any performance issues present, return the modified element within the skeleton as well as the original position selector:

            <!DOCTYPE html>
            <html> 
                <head>
                    <!-- Original position of the element to be modified: html > head > meta:nth-child(3) --> 
                    <meta content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1, shrink-to-fit=no" name="viewport"/>
                    <!-- End of element to be modified --> 
                </head>
            </html> 
            _____
